channel.title: Attack on Titan on Rick Wysocki
channel.description: Recent content in Attack on Titan on Rick Wysocki

item.title: Satoyama, Modernity, and Tradition in Japanese Anime
item.description: I’ve been reading scholarship about anime, its history, and how it deviates from animation in the United States. It’s frequently observed that tensions between tradition and modernity are often central to anime.
